text: Antoninianus of Magnia Urbica. Magnia Urbica was wife of the emperor Carus, . While both Carinus and Numerian were killed in , it is unclear what her own fate may have been or even if she predeceased them. She was granted the honorifics Augusta, and Mater castrorum, senatus ac patriae, "Mother of the (Military) camp, Senate and Fatherland".Southern, Pat, The Roman Empire from Severus to Constantine, Routledge, 2001, , p. 330. == References == ==External links== * Category:Roman empresses Category:Crisis of the Third Century Category:3rd-century Romans Category:3rd-century Roman women Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:Augustae
title: Magnia Urbica
